 -----------------------------------

  How to play:

 -----------------------------------

  First load the .cas in Bluemsx

  and rewind the virtual cassette.

  Then load and run the program

  with the following command:

    run"cas:

  You must discover who killed the

  Count of Roquefort.

  You can move the character using

  the MSX arrows.

  Go to the suspicious participants

  of the party to interrogate them.

  If the suspicious is innocent, one

  try will be rested to yours total

  tries but he/she will tell a clue.

  The gender of one of the killers.

  If you fail the next interrogation,

  another try will be rested but you

  obtain another clue. The place

  where the assesin is: the kitchen,

  the living room (salon) or the

  garden.

  You start with 10 tries. If you

  fail 10 interrogatories you lost.

  You must find out a total of

  15 conspirators.

  Clues (shhhh):

  -the more you play the more you

  instint grow to discover killers

  -look closely, you will find out

  when somebody is in a rare place

  -sometimes the assesins are too

  far the others and sometimes too

  close

  -look for breaking patrons in

  the distribution of the people
